attributes.action: Why do Israel have more rights and support than Palestinians
attributes.additional_details:
Palestinians have been neglected for the past few decades and have the full support by many countries including the UK.

The UK and Israel are friends, but yet no attempts for a strong relationship between the UK and Palestinians.

Why are the Palestinians still not accepted as a full member of the UN where Israel who still commits illegal acts under the human rights law and build un authorised settlements?
